name: FBA Hunting Angry Lion: Hard C
name_original: FBA Hunting Angry Lion: Hard C
description:
FBA Hunting Angry Lion: Hard Challenge is most attractive and amazing action game. Yes! we believe we did the best and we hope you will find yourself in a realistic and full of adventure in the most realistic environment with realistic jungle trees, mountain, water lakes and grass etc. We put so many levels to increasement your hunting fun. There are angry lions in the jungle; you have got the challenge to hunt the Angry Lions as an expert hunter.
FEATURES:
Unlimited ammo
Best 3D graphics or jungle.
Best sniper gun for accurate shooting.
3D first person shooting game.
The natural sounds of Lion and fire.
Real 3D Lions with best animations.
